name: Bushigros v1.0
description:
Puzzle platformer - You play as a Ninja that can't move but can teleport with its kunai. Following the way of the bushigros, get all the dumpling and feast! How To Play

Aim with {Arrows}
Press {Space} to throw the {Kunai}
Release {Space} to teleport

How To Win

Grab the {Dumpling}
Hit the {Dumpling} with the {Kunai}

Controller supported

by SanchoVII and BoyKun
